attributes.action: consider hauliers when issuing parking tickets!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
LONDON & PARKING TICKETS. GRRRR!

I, as a haulier find this extremely frustrating and very expensive. access to most places in london is awful and the space to park safely and unload is minimal. loading bays are few & far between now because square metres = money. 9/10 deliverys we make have no such facilities. But we try our best... and in doing so get tickets for numerous "reasons". so Im asking for a compromise.. please consider the need for hgvs and allow us an hour for loading or unloading or "perhaps" you could provide us with special bays similiar to - taxi ranks, bus stops and disabled bays - at regular intervals throughout the city.
